name: lief
content:
sb had/would as lief do sth old use
Add to word list
Add to word list
If someone had/would as lief to do something, they would prefer to do something: He saw that I would as lief be alone.
More examplesFewer examplesI'd as lief have him on my side as against me."I'd as lief not invite sister Deane this time," said Mrs Tulliver.He muttered that he had as lief stand as sit.His clerk would not touch the cheese, saying he had as lief chew soap.
